title: Chapter 1874 - An Ill-Fated Encounter
body:
Chapter 1874 - An Ill-Fated Encounter

Su Yi rose from the Dao Manifestation Chaos Stele. 

He’d decided to leave. First, he’d stop by the ruins of the Dragon Palace to check on the Red Dragon Dao Monarch. Then, he’d stop by Jade Firmament Immortal Palace.

Before entering Spiritual Desolation Mountain, he sent a Great Martial Stage expert of Jade Firmament Immortal Palace to inform his sect that Su Yi would be visiting them soon. Su Yi was planning a "reunion" with Immortal Sovereign Sky-Killer, Chu Shentong, one of Wang Ye’s enemies.

He said he'd come, so Su Yi naturally wouldn’t go back on his word. Besides, he’d already spent a month on Spiritual Desolation Mountain. It was time he left.

“Do you understand yet?” Su Yi looked at the nearby Sky-Covering Boat.

“I don’t.” Lin Feng appeared on board. “Perhaps I’ll only understand… after you’ve fused with Master’s Dao Imprint.”

Su Yi could tell at a glance that Lin Feng was still unwilling to accept that he was his master.

“Very well.” Su Yi didn’t push him. Instead, he announced his decision to leave.

Lin Feng fell briefly silent, then said, “Then how will I find you again?”

Su Yi laughed dryly,...
